title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7024.7 - Change of religion
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7024.7 - Change of religion

State Regulations
A prisoner shall be permitted to change his religious
affiliation upon application to the appropriate religious authority. The
prisoner and the appropriate religious authority shall notify the chief
administrative officer of such change. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7024.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
